sentence: FIRST ON FOX: A super PAC supporting Georgia GOP Senate candidate Herschel Walker is spending more than $50,000 on a billboard campaign attacking Sen. Raphael Warnock over inflation and gas prices as the midterms loom later this year.
author: Tyler Olson
title: Pro-Herschel Walker PAC hits Warnock over gas prices, inflation in billboard ads

sentence: Warnock, chosen by voters in a special election, is on the ballot again this year in a high-profile race that could pit him against Trump's choice for the Republican nomination, the former football star Herschel Walker.
author: Fredreka Schouten
title: Plans to close all but one polling place in a rural Georgia county reverberate through a battleground state

sentence: With less than a month until early voting begins in the Georgia primaries, the increasingly frustrated Republicans running against Herschel Walker are accusing the famous former footballer of conducting what they call the basement strategy, of President Joe Biden, who kept a restricted schedule during the pandemic campaign of 2020.
author: Patricia Murphy
title: OPINION: Herschel Walkers Velvet Rope Campaign

sentence: Trump-backed Georgia Republican Herschel Walker, a former NFL running back and Heisman Trophy winner, won his party primary for the U.S. Senate according to the Associated Press, which called the race at 7:56 p.m. E.T.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Herschel Walker Clinches Georgias U.S. Senate Republican Primary
